price: باش بزانن کە بەڕاستی خوا تۆڵەی زۆر بە تینە (بۆ یاخیان) وە بەڕاستی خوا لێبووردە و میھرەبانە (بۆ تۆ بەکاران)
arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: iʿ'lamū anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi wa-anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
